title: Buying Next Smartphone - Five Points to Be Considered (Debopom Sanyal)
text: By Debopom Sanyal Oct 14, 2015 Mobile phones have become a necessity of every person in the modern world. As a user, everyone does some or the other research before buying a new Smartphone. However, one must be aware of the things that should be considered before buying a new Smartphone. Do you have any idea about the numbers of smartphones available in the market? Well, the huge numbers actually make your selection tougher and harder. Therefore, the filter is very much required for the research on the Smartphones. So, here are the points that you must consider before you buy the next Smartphone.The Size MattersThe Display size of the phone is perhaps the most attractive feature, but as a user you must be clear of your need. All phones do not fit into the pocket or the purse. Hence, you must decide the size of the phone that you can comfortably carry. You must understand that smaller screen size never translates lesser features for a Smartphone.Features as per needThere are wide ranges of features available in the Smartphone. However, the features should always match the need of the customer. If you are a game freak and you are looking for a phone to play quality games then make sure you go for an appropriate phone with graphic card, high RAM, and strong Processor. At the same time, if you want your phone for photography, then you may look for higher camera resolution. It is, however, noteworthy to understand that features have a direct impact on the performance of the phone.Platform of your choiceEveryone has an own taste of platform when it comes to Smartphone. The very basic decision that you must make is whether you would go for IOS, Android or Windows Phone. There is no point in searching for Samsung Phones when IOS is your preferred choice. Also, when you decide the platform, you should also consider the apps that you may use frequently. These apps may force you to rethink your decision. If you use some common apps for your professional purpose but that does not get supported on IOS, then there is no point of going to the Operating System. In other words, a simple comparative study is required about the apps and the platforms before choosing the right phone.BudgetIt is the most important part of the Smartphone selection. Your budget defines the research and the choice of the phone. You can either fix the budget and search for the appropriate phone or search your choice and decide the budget accordingly.The favorite brandWell, the choice of the brand comes when you have decided all other things. However, this is not so important from a buying perspective, but a user generally has the mindset to favor a brand. There are two ways of selecting brand for your next Smartphone purchase. The first option is to find a brand that has all the qualities you want else find a brand and find most of the qualities in the same.Apart from all these, one must remain updated to technologies from various resources to know more about the Smartphone and the industry. About the Author The content is written by Debopom Sanyal as per his insight and views of the industry. He is a Technology Enthusiast and Passionate Writer .
